title: I WAITED IT SHOULD COUNT
body:
I WAITED a 20 m ban and then a remake why it is not counted as a match i wanted the 20 so????????
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
A full match is necessary in order to be counted towards resolving a low-priority queue, so a remade match *does not* count towards working down an LPQ.

Let me know if you have any questions.
